venue.name: Caddy Memorial Park At Wollaston Beach

item.description:
Join the SSFMG for a walk along Wollaston Beach. Plan on walking 1-1.5 hours. The parking to the end and back is 4 miles.

Just remember to dress in layers as it can be windy and cool along the beach. You may want to bring water as well.

If you have any questions about this event, please contact me. THANKS!

Wollaston Beach Walk
Thursday, October 14th @ 6:30 pm
Caddy Memorial Park
Quincy Shore Drive
Quincy, MA
(the park by the traffic light ACROSS the street from the beach)
Meet by the flag pole

Organizer: Julie

Min/Max: At least 3 Yes RSVPs by noon, Thursday the 14th.

Attendance is unlimited.

Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by noon on Thursday the 14th. I will only wait 10 minutes for stragglers, so please try to be on time. If you decide last minute (after the deadline) that you would like to join us, just show up by 6:30 PM.

Inclement Weather:
We will walk if it is overcast or there is a slight drizzle.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions to Caddy Memorial Park @ Wollaston Beach:

Wollaston Beach can be accessed from many points.

If using GPS, use 1278 Quincy Shore Dr., Quincy, MA 02170

The best way to get to our meeting place is to get off 93N at Exit 8 (Furnace Brook Parkway), exit ramp rotary following small green sign for Furnace Brook Parkway, and follow Furnace Brook Parkway for 2.9 miles.

Furnace Brook Parkway ends at Wollaston Beach, and you take a left onto Quincy Shore Drive.

After only 0.2 (two-tenths) miles, our meeting place comes up on the left.

The parking lot for Caddy Park has a small footbridge and a flag poll that are visible from the main road. Look for the organizer there.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet by the flag pole. THIS IS THE LOT ACROSS THE STREET FROM THE BEACH.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Evening Walk at the Beach
